sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Caterpillar ( CAT ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.3%.
Year to date, Caterpillar has lost about 12.1% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ), trading down 1.8%.
Procter & Gamble Company is lower by about 15.2% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Cisco Systems ( CSCO ), trading down 0.5%, and JPMorgan Chase ( JPM ), trading up 2.2% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
